title: SHA1
extract: SHA1 Hash Generator. This online tool allows you to generate the SHA1 hash from any string. SHA1 is more secure than MD5. You can generate the sha1 checksum of your files to verify the identity of them later, or generate the SHA1 hashes of your users' passwords to prevent them from being leaked.
extract_html: SHA1 Hash Generator. This online tool allows you to generate the SHA1 hash from any string. SHA1 is more secure than MD5. You can generate the sha1 checksum of your files to verify the identity of them later, or generate the SHA1 hashes of your users' passwords to prevent them from being leaked.
